level.heading: Applicability of provisions.
level.text: Except as herein provided, societies shall be governed by this chapter and shall be exempt from all other provisions of the insurance laws of the District unless they are expressly designated therein, or unless they are specifically made applicable by this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-86
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-5301.
